Action.author: jjjjibm
Action.body: Date: Thu Feb 9 18:46:30 2017 -0500 node-SDK Fix FAB-2158 pkcs11-tests.js fails The test pkcs11-tests.js was looking for softHSM libraries in '/usr/lib/libacsp-pkcs11.so' based on process.platform <> 'darwin'. The libraries are actually in /usr/local/lib/softhsm/libsofthsm2.so. I added 'linux' to the list of platforms with SoftHSM libraries in /usr/local/lib/softhsm/libsofthsm2.so. Change-Id: Ie997bb8beca657bd22f0340f8c10ab8e37e0b579 Signed-off-by: jjjjibm >
